name: You Can Fall In Love
description:
A kinetic landscape of one moment. The idea of the Theater District and surrounding areas in Midtown, Manhattan, New York, New York.

You are lost and cannot find your mom (what does your mom look like? [you will see her if you try])

Other things to find:

  • Elmo
  • Cookie Monster
  • Big Bird
  • Mickey Mouse
  • Minnie Mouse
  • American Flag
  • Spider-Man
  • Deadpool
  • Batman
  • Olaf
  • Pac Man
  • Mario
  • Three Different Minions
  • Tits
  • Disney Logo
  • Under Cover Cop
  • King of the City
  • Grandma
  • Faceless Smile

Come up with some of your own goals too... I wonder what the chance of Mickey and Minnie dancing is? What if someone runs into someone else with the same t-shirt?

You can follow a rose wherever it grows
Yeah, you can fall in love with Times Square
~Dan Bejar
